item.title: On-call only works when responders are happy
item.description: Incidents can happen despite our best efforts. It’s the nature of the software systems we build today, relying on complex distributed systems with emergent behaviours. Incidents donâ€™t care about the concept of working hours and without the luxury of a follow-the-sun response team, it means sometimes, somebody needs to respond out-of-hours.
